GUIDE_MSG_001:
Only the administrator can pull the valve attached to the Stone Statue
on this floor!
WATER_VALVE_MSG_001:
There's a Stone Statue here, with a handle attached
to it. Would you like to turn the handle?Ă
WATER_VALVE_MSG_002: The water level appears to have lowered.
WATER_VALVE_MSG_003:
̄The valve on the Stone Statue has already been
turned. It looks like it can't be turned back, either.
REC_POINT_VALVE_02:
It looks like the Stone Statue monster, but it is not.
You will not be attacked if you turn it's handle.
REC_POINT_GUIDE_001:
̄A stone tile with letters inscribed upon it.
Seems to be the language of the Demons.
REC_POINT_PLATE_02:
̄It looks heavy, but floats on the water. It seems fairly
sturdy, and must be made of a light-weight material.
